item.title: Rev. Dr. Joseph Boot:The Heresy of Liberal Democracy [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ March 11, 2023

On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Mike is joined by the Founder and President of the Ezra Institute for Contemporary Culture, Rev. Dr. Jospeh Boot, to talk about the heresy of liberal democracy. Tune in to find out what that means. 

Episode Resource: Ezra Institute Website: https://www.ezrainstitute.com/; Ruler of Kings: Toward a  Christian Vision of Government by Joseph Boot: https://ezrapress.ca/products/ruler-of-kings-toward-a-christian-vision-of-government;  Ezra Press Resources: https://ezrapress.ca/. 

STAND WITH JOSH - Sign the Petition: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/i-stand-with-josh-alexander/;

item.title: Dr. P. Andrew Sandlin: Why Christian Culture Matters [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ March 4, 2023

On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Mike is joined by the Founder and President of the Center for Cultural Leadership (CCL), Dr. P. Andrew Sandlin, to discuss theology, philosophy, ethics, and why Christian culture matters.

Episode Resource: https://christianculture.com/; https://docsandlin.com; Dr. Sandlin's Substack: https://pandrewsandlin.substack.com/; Dr. Sandlin's Books: https://www.amazon.com/stores/P.-Andrew-Sandlin/author/B001K833FK?ref=ap_rdr&store_ref=ap_rdr&isDramIntegrated=true&shoppingPortalEnabled=true;

item.title: Teacher, FIRED for not Getting Jabbed! ft. Author Carolyn Johnson [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ February 25, 2023

On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Mike is joined by bilingual teacher and author Carolyn Johnson. She was fired from teaching at a prestigious french school because she refused to take experimental gene therapy. Listen in as they talk about medical tyranny, woke teaching, and pursuing your dreams amidst the tumult. 

Episode Resource: https://www.carolynjohnsonbooks.com/ 

STAND WITH JOSH - Sign the Petition: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/i-stand-with-josh-alexander/;

item.title: President of CBCN Talks Biology and Ethics ft. Jennifer Lahl [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ February 25, 2023

On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Mike is joined by a bioethicist, the President of  The Center of Bioethics and Culture Network, Jennifer Lahl. Jen and Mike talk about some of the biggest bio-ethical concerns, from abortion to radical body-disfiguring trans surgeries on minors. 

Episode Resource: https://cbc-network.org/

item.title: Arrested for Attending School ft. Josh Alexander & James S.M. Kitchen [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ February 11, 2023

On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Mike is joined by student walkout organizer Josh Alexander, who was recently arrested for attending school, and his lawyer, LCC chief litigator James S.M. Kitchen to talk about his recent arrest and the unfolding legal situation.

Sign the Petition: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/i-stand-with-josh-alexander/;

Josh Alexander v. Renfrew County Catholic District School Board:  https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/liberty-defense-fund/josh-alexander-v-rccdsb/;
